about_the_game:
“Chronicles” are packs of themed levels with a self-contained story told throughout, and are unlocked after completing the first 6 levels of the main campaign.

The arrival of rowdy tourists disrupts the serenity of a group of tropical islands home to the meticulous ecologists Pirate Sisters. As the ambition of the castaways agitates the ecosystem, it’s up to its self-proclaimed protectors to take matters into their own hands and restore their home.

“The Keeper's Shanty” is the fifth DLC for Outlanders, in which we follow the trials and tribulations of both locals and newcomers in a trail through the oasis-like landscapes the islands have to offer.

In addition to the 6-level campaign, this DLC contains new customization options for Sandbox mode.
